name: Vada
description:
Capstone project for my Independent Game Design course.

Philip Petersen - Game Design/Level Design

Adrian De Andrade - Programmer/Game Design

Nicholas Campoli - Art/Animation

Arti comes across a mysterious rune that allows him to teleport to it when thrown. Arti places the rune in his backpack and uses it to travers harsh lands, solve puzzles and thwart the invading forces who wish to seize the power for their own nefarious desires.
